text: Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia uan dafaribav sogh, pamtemɨn dagaribar nguazim dɨkɨva, osemezɨ moghɨn kamagh mɨkɨm, ‘Mevzika! Israelɨn ikɨzim, me arazir kurar kɨ ifongezir puvatɨzir avɨribagh ami.’ Kamaghɨn amizɨ, apaniba izɨva men tarazi, bar me mɨsoghɨrarigham. Eghtɨ men tarazi, mɨtiriaba ko arɨmariaba me damutɨ, me arɨghiregham.
